full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA 'PHAGS MA GDUGS DKAR CAN GYI SGRUB THABS MCHOG TU GRUB PA'I SNYING PO SOGS YI DAM SGRUB SKOR DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG BZHUGS SO, , *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA 'PHAGS MA GDUGS DKAR CAN GYI SGRUB THABS MCHOG TU GRUB PA'I SNYING PO NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA 'PHAGS MA GDUGS DKAR CAN GYI SGRUB THABS MCHOG TU GRUB PA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG NYID DAD PAS KHA TON DU BYA PHYIR RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YAB SRAS KYI GSUNG LAS BTUS TE DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN 'PHAGS MA GDUGS DKAR CAN GYIS MYUR DU SKYOB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
